Jul 25, 2002

Guatemalan militia to get massacre reward

“The Guatemalan government is planning to reward the paramilitaries who took part in the massacre of tens of thousands of villagers during the country’s civil war. The decision has been criticised by civil rights groups, who say the government has still not paid reparations to many of the paramilitaries’ victims.” Guardian Unlimited
